Package net.explorviz.shared.config.helper

Class PropertyHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.explorviz.shared.config.helper.PropertyHelper
  • public final class PropertyHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to read configuration properties in non-DI contexts. Use the Config instead.

        public static void setBooleanProperty​(java.lang.String propName,
                                      boolean value)
                               throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                      java.io.IOException
        Set a boolean property inside the explorviz.properties file.
        Parameters:
        propName - - Property key
        value - - Property value. String or string-castable object.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - - Thrown if explorviz.properties was not found.
        java.io.IOException - - Thrown if cast to String did not work.
